channel.title: Software on Star5o's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Software on Star5o's Blog

item.title: Simple install hugo with Multi-language support
item.description: just use other’s confige 直接拷贝已有好的配置～ 1 git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/CyrusYip/cyrusyip-blog.git 添加 favicon 利用https://realfavicongenerator.net/ 将头像做成favicon，然后放到static目录里 修改标题 修改config.tom
